verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of the valley<WH1516> of vision<WH2384>. What aileth thee now<WH645>, that thou art wholly gone up<WH5927> to the housetops<WH1406>?

And it came to pass<WH4005>, that thy choicest valleys<WH6010> were full<WH4390> of chariots<WH7393>, and the horsemen<WH6571> set<WH7896> themselves in array<WH7896> at the gate<WH8179>.
And he took<WH1540> away the covering<WH4539> of Judah<WH3063>; and thou didst look<WH5027> in that day<WH3117> to the armor<WH5402> in the house<WH1004> of the forest<WH3293>.
And ye saw<WH7200> the breaches<WH1233> of the city<WH5892> of David<WH1732>, that they were many<WH7231>; and ye gathered together<WH6908> the waters<WH4325> of the lower<WH8481> pool<WH1295>;
and ye numbered<WH5608> the houses<WH1004> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and ye brake down<WH5422> the houses<WH1004> to fortify<WH1219> the wall<WH2346>;

ye made<WH6213> also a reservoir<WH4724> between the two walls<WH2346> for the water<WH4325> of the old<WH3465> pool<WH1295>. But ye looked<WH5027> not unto him that had done<WH6213> this<WH7200>, neither had ye respect unto him that purposed<WH3335> it long ago<WH7350>.

And in that day<WH3117> did the Lord<WH136>, Jehovah<WH3069> of hosts<WH6635>, call<WH7121> to weeping<WH1065>, and to mourning<WH4553>, and to baldness<WH7144>, and to girding<WH2296> with sackcloth<WH8242>:

And Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> revealed<WH1540> himself in mine ears<WH241>, Surely this iniquity<WH5771> shall not be forgiven<WH3722> you till ye die<WH4191>, saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136>, Jehovah<WH3069> of hosts<WH6635>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136>, Jehovah<WH3069> of hosts<WH6635>, Go<WH3212>, get<WH935> thee unto this treasurer<WH5532>, even unto Shebna<WH7644>, who is over the house<WH1004>, and say,

What doest thou here<WH6311>? and whom has thou here, that thou hast hewed thee out<WH2672> here<WH6311> a sepulchre<WH6913>? hewing him out<WH2672> a sepulchre<WH6913> on high<WH4791>, graving a habitation<WH4908> for himself in the rock<WH5553>!
Behold <WH3068>, Jehovah, like a strong<WH1397> man<WH2925>, will hurl thee away<WH2904> violently<WH5844>; yea, he will wrap thee up closely<WH5844>.

He will surely<WH6801> wind thee round<WH6801> and round<WH6802>, and toss thee like a ball<WH1754> into a large<WH7342> country<WH776>; there shalt thou die<WH4191>, and there shall be the chariots<WH4818> of thy glory<WH3519>, thou shame<WH7036> of thy lord<WH113>'s house<WH1004>.
And I will thrust<WH1920> thee from thine office<WH4673>; and from thy station<WH4673> shalt thou be pulled down<WH2040>.
And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that I will call<WH7121> my servant<WH5650> Eliakim<WH471> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah<WH2518>:

and I will clothe<WH3847> him with thy robe<WH3801>, and strengthen<WH2388> him with thy girdle<WH73>, and I will commit<WH5414> thy government<WH4475> into his hand<WH3027>; and he shall be a father<WH1> to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>.

And the key<WH4668> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> will I lay<WH5414> upon his shoulder<WH7926>; and he shall open<WH6605>, and none shall shut<WH5462>; and he shall shut<WH5462>, and none shall open<WH6605>.
And I will fasten<WH8628> him as a nail<WH3489> in a sure<WH539> place<WH4725>; and he shall be for a throne<WH3678> of glory<WH3519> to his father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>.

And they shall hang<WH8518> upon him all the glory<WH3519> of his father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, the offspring<WH6631> and the issue<WH6849>, every<WH3627> small<WH6996> vessel<WH3627>, from the cups<WH101> even to all the<WH3627> flagons<WH5035>.

In that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, shall the nail<WH3489> that was fastened<WH8628> in a sure<WH539> place<WH4725> give way<WH4185>; and it shall be hewn down<WH1438>, and fall<WH5307>; and the burden<WH4853> that was upon it shall be cut off<WH3772>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath spoken it<WH1696>.
